verses.text: \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w mine|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* measuring line \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* hand.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w*, Whither goest \w thou|strong="H1696"\w*? \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w To|strong="H1696"\w* measure \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* see \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* breadth \w thereof|strong="H7161"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* length \w thereof|strong="H7161"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w*, \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* angel \w that|strong="H7200"\w* talked \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* forth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w* angel \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w meet|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, Run, \w speak|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* young \w man|strong="H5375"\w*, \w saying|strong="H6310"\w*, Jerusalem \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* inhabited \w as|strong="H6213"\w* villages \w without|strong="H3808"\w* walls, \w by|strong="H3808"\w* reason \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* cattle therein.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w*, saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wall \w of|strong="H3027"\w* fire \w round|strong="H5869"\w* \w about|strong="H2009"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* glory \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w*.

Ho, \w ho|strong="H3068"\w*, flee \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* north, saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w spread|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w abroad|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* four winds \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* heavens, saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.
Ho Zion, \w escape|strong="H3318"\w*, \w thou|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H4397"\w* dwellest \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H4397"\w* Babylon.

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* thus \w saith|strong="H1696"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* hosts: After glory \w hath|strong="H3389"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* sent \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* nations which plundered \w you|strong="H8432"\w*; \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w that|strong="H5288"\w* toucheth \w you|strong="H8432"\w* toucheth \w the|strong="H8432"\w* apple \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H8432"\w* eye.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w*, behold, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* shake \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5439"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spoil \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5439"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

Sing \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6566"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w*, lo, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* come, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3427"\w* many nations \w shall|strong="H1323"\w* \w join|strong="H3427"\w* themselves \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H4422"\w* day, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w shall|strong="H1323"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* \w my|strong="H4422"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*; \w and|strong="H3427"\w* I \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1323"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w thou|strong="H3427"\w* shalt know \w that|strong="H4422"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* hosts \w hath|strong="H6726"\w* sent me \w unto|strong="H1945"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* inherit Judah \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* portion \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* holy land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* choose \w Jerusalem|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* silent, \w all|strong="H3045"\w* flesh, \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* waked \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy habitation.
